name: XXXTentacion Beatmaker
description:
If you search a hip-hop music producer pad software for your android smartphone or tablet you are in the right place. Our best music producer tools are called Pushpad and Mega Pads. It's a kind of a super pads sound board that allow you to practice finger drumming for free on your mobile app like if you are on your mpc or launch pad. It's a little bit different of software for live or studio because with our pad you can create sequence using your owm finger rythm. This mixing technique is quite complex, you really need to have the rhythm in the skin but thanks to our training mode everyone can start!

This app is an wonderfull XXXTentacion launch pad that let's you create remarkable hip-hop music mashup and feel like a real beatmaker. This free app is like a studio software but is simpler and faster, you can make a beat in just one minute! It simulates a launch pad also called MPC on the hip-hop industry. With XXXTentacion Beatmaker app you can create really awesome hip-hop, rap core and emo beat ! Be the best alternative hip-hop beatmaker with our MPC like app !

This sample pack provided by freebeatsandsamples.com features the heavy distorted sound of artists like XXXTentacion, Lil Pump and Trippie Redd. If you are looking for type beat like Lil Pump or Trippie Redd this app is for you, you can download it freely now !

// MULTI-TOUCH
* Up to 10 fingers simultaneously

// MULTI-GRID
* Up to 196 keys (A/B/C...)

// FREE DRUM PADS MACHINE
* Ultra low latency audio player
* Studio audio quality
* Music Production Center (MPC)

// FOR PRO DJs AND AMATEURS
* Training mode
* Free mode

// YOU CAN PLAY IT WITH YOUR OWN SOUND SAMPLES
* Sound library
* Automatic import

// YOU CAN CONFIGURE MANY SETTINGS FOR EACH KEY
* Volume
* Pitch
* Player
* Add
* Move
* Delete
* Choke

// YOU CAN ADD EFFECTS
* Echo filters
* Roll filters
* Reverb filters
* Low pass filters
* High pass filters

// YOU CAN RECORD
* Rec Loop from grid
* Rec Microphone
* Rec Memory
* Export Memory/grid

// YOU CAN USE SEQUENCER MODE
* Programmable Pattern
* Tempo (BPM) selection

// WORKS ON ALL DEVICES & SCREEN RESOLUTIONS
* Mobile Phones
* Tablets

Try it now and Enjoy :)

● Disclaimer: This is a fan-made app. The sound pack used are from various sources, generally is sample pack of type beat/inspired by, music stems or sampled music. More information about origin of the sound pack cand be found in the credits/licences section inside the app. For copyright issues, please mail us here: djpadmusic@gmail.com
